isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - STOPMASTER WEDGE TYPE BRAKE - INSPECT - ADJUSTING PLUNGER

svcproc.title: ADJUSTING PLUNGER
svcproc.para: If the internal scoring of an adjusting plunger consists of only light markings, the plunger may be reused ( Figure 36). However, if the scoring is rough, replace the part.

figure.caption: Figure 36. Judging Wear on Adjusting Plunger

svcproc.para: Shown in Figure 37on the left is a normal roller contact patch on the ramp of an adjusting plunger and this part may be reused. On the right of Figure 37is the rectangular indentation of a brinelled roller ramp. This plunger must be replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 37. Judging Wear on Adjusting Plunger Roller Contract Ramp

svcproc.para: It is acceptable for the pawl guide slot in the adjusting cam to have light contact marks. If the guide slots are scored and have deep marks, the plunger must be replaced.
